articles.author: Emma Tucker, Artemis Moshtaghian
articles.title: Wayne LaPierre announces resignation as leader of the NRA days ahead of civil trial - CNN
articles.description: Wayne LaPierre, the leader of the National Rifle Association of America who served for decades as a fierce protector of the Second Amendment, advocating for firearms owners and manufacturers, announced his resignation on Friday – days before his civil trial i…
